Text: You are too weak to speak with me, child.
I have a task for you. Will you help me?
Thank`s, I`m seeking for a holy Grail.  Look for and bring it to me, I`ll be grateful!
Wonderful you have made it! Congratulations
Event: quest Holy Grail has been completed

Text: I have a reward for you!

Event: quest Holy Grail has been rewarded

Text: Thanks for your help. Now I can rest!
